title: all off cant login ppl not from na huh

replies.body: There was a [service incident](http://forums.xfinity.com/t5/X1/TV-Service-Interruption-10-11-2016/td-p/2813767) that Comcast experienced in connecting players to our servers. This issue has since been resolved, so if you're still having issues, please let me know.
Comcast is currently having a problem with their internet. It is not Riot's fault.
